location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Jonathan Duncan, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is transmitting a warning to the Bombay Government, so they may forewarn the commanders of any vessels intending to navigate through the Gulf; Rhama ben Jabber [Raḥmah bin Jābir] 'noted free booter and terror of this quarter of the Gulf', has put to sail with five boats.
